name: TVApplicationControllerDelegate
desc: A protocol used to observe and manage the different states of an application controller.

items.name: func appController(TVApplicationController, didFail: Error)
items.desc: Tell the delegate the app controller failed due to an error.

items.name: func appController(TVApplicationController, didFinishLaunching: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the app controller has finished launching.

items.name: func appController(TVApplicationController, didStop: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the app has stopped for any reason.

items.name: func appController(TVApplicationController, evaluateAppJavaScriptIn: JSContext)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to add JavaScript classes and objects.

items.name: func player(for: TVApplicationController) -> TVPlayer?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for a custom player object for a particular player bridge.
